ygData.subject: Re: MESH / NETTED ARMOUR
ygData.msgSnippet: The swamp is fantastic if you watch out for Lynunga, the Troll Slayer, the Troll Captain, and all the Troll Guards, they ll KOS ya.  However, the swamp has
ygData.messageBody:
The swamp is fantastic if you watch out for Lynunga, the Troll Slayer, the
Troll Captain, and all the Troll Guards, they'll KOS ya. However, the swamp
has TONS of froglocks (watch out for mobs and trains) ranging from newbie at
the far end of the swamp from where you enter to froglock foragers and
kobold hunters where you come in. Then, after you hit about 15th level, go
deep into guk and get the good stuff.


-----Original Message-----
From: Moe Drippins [mailto:ug@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 12:09 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] MESH / NETTED ARMOUR

From: Moe Drippins <ug@...>

Steve Heath writes:

> Have you headed down to innothule (sp?) swamp? Even if you can't
> find it yourself, I've often come across trolls who will sell it
> (albeit for high prices). Still, considering in Qeynos someone would
> have been happy to pay 12pp for netted gloves, it's probably worth
> the trip.

Is there good hunting down in that area, netting notwithstanding? I
just made the run from Qeynos to Freeport and N. Ro isn't all that
terribly exciting. Also, I initially MADE the run as an interim step
to Innothule/Guk, strictly for netted stuff. (And Woven. And Mesh.
Both of which are in desperate short supply in Qeynos.)

Where do you guys all hunt? I'm only 9'th level so I may be somewhat
limited in my choices, but would love to hear what you all are
doing/have done.
